ReportText: FINAL REPORT INDICATION: ___-year-old male with cough and shortness of breath. COMPARISON: ___. CHEST, PA AND LATERAL: There is mild hyperinflation. The lungs are clear. There are no pleural effusions or pneumothorax. Heart size is normal. IMPRESSION: No acute cardiopulmonary process.
